wordquizzle.wqserver

Class Challenge

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordquizzle.wqserver.Challenge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Challenge
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Challenge class implements the match between two players.
